ISSUE.TITLE: Javascript errors in the admin
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The latest update to the new asset manager broke some scripts in the admin. E.g. in: https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/blob/4b92d86ce9af656c2004f4f959cfe28060081465/src/OrchardCore.Modules/OrchardCore.ContentTypes/Views/Admin/AddFieldTo.cshtml#L71 `getTechnicalName` is missing in the admin, it looks like it's minified away or renamed. /cc @Skrypt

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Enhance AzureAISearch to support indexes independent of content items (#17556)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix script dependeny on content types UI Fix #17565
